```{r}
packages = c('sf', 'tmap', 'ggmap', 'rgdal', 'tidyverse', 'readr', 'ahp')
for (p in packages){ 
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p) 
  }
  library(p,character.only = T) 
}
```
